item.title: I am Back!
item.description: After a period of inactivity in this blog I am back to the regular posts. I had to move the content to GitHub Pages to feel more comfortable when creating content. Also it is closer to the tools that I use everyday. After a comment this evening from Lu√≠s Gabriel I felt that I need to fix the smaller bugs in theme setup and I think I made a little mess with the blog comments.
